description: This fluffy pancake recipe has Greek-style yoghurt, sugar-free maple syrup, fresh berries and crunchy pistachios - try it for your next brekkie.
name: Fluffy Raspberry & Yoghurt Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour and bicarbonate of soda in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Make a well in the centre. Whisk eggs, banana, milk, vanilla, 2 tbs syrup and 1 cup yoghurt in a medium bowl. Add to well and stir until smooth and combined. Tear half of the raspberries in half and fold through batter. Set aside for 10 minutes to rest.

Brush a large frying pan with a little of the melted spread. Heat over medium heat. Spoon 1/4 cup batter into pan and spread to form a 10cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface. Flip over and cook for 2 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining spread and batter to make 12 pancakes in total.

Combine strawberries, blueberries and remaining raspberries in a small bowl. Place 2 pancakes on each plate and top with remaining yoghurt. Scatter with berries and pistachios and drizzle with remaining syrup.
